description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Whack Em...in a hole! A modern take of a classic carnival game. Whack various creatures with your hands just like you would in an amusement park! Unlock different difficulties and stages with high scores! And all for the price of a hot dog and soda.
description.short: Whack Em...in a hole! A modern take of a classic carnival game. Whack various creatures with your hands just like you would in an amusement park! Unlock different difficulties and stages with high scores! And all for the price of a hot dog and soda.
